title: Backlog grade
content: I read somewhere that you can’t achieve an S or an A grade and the highest you’ll get is a B grade in btech. Is this true??

comments.body: Yes , Highest u can score is B grade. Even if u get full marks.
not true, I know ppl who got As and if you check the ESA graph you’ll see ppl getting an S
Nope. The grades work just like your ESA. In fact, the paper will actually be a bit easier so if you study well, u can get an A or S
This is just not true. I've only gotten an A in a backlog
This isn't true. Seeing the results graphs there are people who get S grade. But those are very few.
I meant in a backlog in btech
